amendment.description: To ensure that future funding for health care for former members of the Armed Forces takes into account changes in population and inflation.

action.text: Amendment SA 1937 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1937.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1937 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1937 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 251.
Amendment SA 1937 ruled out of order by the chair.
